```{r, message=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
# ysr at t1
ysrt1 <- read_csv(ysr_t1_old_fp) %>%
  mutate(ELS_ID = factor(ELS_ID)
         ) %>%
  dplyr::select(ELS_ID, T1_YSR_old_Withdrawn_Total_Score, T1_YSR_old_Somatic_Complaints_Total_Score, T1_YSR_old_AnxiousDepressed_Total_Score)

ysrt1_dup <- ysrt1 %>% filter(duplicated(ELS_ID))

# ysr at t3
ysrt3 <- read_csv(ysr_t3_fp) %>%
  mutate(ELS_ID = factor(ELS_ID)
         ) %>%
  dplyr::select(ELS_ID,Session_Type, T3_YSR_New_AnxiousDepressed_Total_Score, T3_YSR_New_WithdrawnDepressed_Total_Score, T3_YSR_New_Somatic_Complaints_Total_Score) %>%
  replace_with_na(.,
                  replace = list(
                                 T3_YSR_New_AnxiousDepressed_Total_Score =
                                   c("888", "999"),
                                 T3_YSR_New_WithdrawnDepressed_Total_Score =
                                   c("888", "999"),
                                 T3_YSR_New_Somatic_Complaints_Total_Score = 
                                   c("888", "999")
                                 )
  )

ysrt3_dup <- ysrt3 %>% filter(duplicated(ELS_ID))

ysrt3 <- ysrt3 %>%
  filter(is.na(Session_Type)) %>%
  dplyr::select(-Session_Type) %>%
  drop_na(T3_YSR_New_Somatic_Complaints_Total_Score)
```

```{r, message=FALSE}
siq_graph <- read_csv(graph_net_fp) %>%
  mutate(ELS_ID = factor(ELS_ID)
         )
ysr_siq_graph <-
  left_join(siq_graph, ysrt1, by = "ELS_ID")
ysr_siq_graph <-
  left_join(ysr_siq_graph, ysrt3, by = "ELS_ID")
```

### cronbach's alpha
```{r}
library(cocron)
ysr_t1_alpha <- ysr_siq_graph %>%
  dplyr::select(starts_with("T1_YSR")) %>%
  dplyr::select(-T1_YSR_old_Internalizing_Problems_Total_Score)

cronbach.alpha(ysr_t1_alpha, standardized = T)
# alpha 
# 0.8042493  

ysr_t3_alpha <- ysr_siq_graph %>%
  dplyr::select(starts_with("T3_YSR")) %>%
  dplyr::select(-T3_YSR_New_Internalizing_Problems_Total_Score)

cronbach.alpha(ysr_t3_alpha, standardized = T)
# alpha 
# 0.8223951  
```


```{r}
options(scipen=999) 
z_score <- function(x) {
diff_mu <- x - mean(x, na.rm = T)
sd <- sd(x, na.rm = T)
diff_mu / sd
}
```


```{r}
library(dlookr)
ysr_z <- ysr_siq_graph %>% 
  mutate(ysr_minmax = transform(ysr_siq_graph$T3_YSR_New_Internalizing_Problems_Total_Score, method = "minmax")) %>%
  dplyr::select(ysr_minmax) %>% 
  boxplot()

ysr_log = transform(ysr_siq_graph$T3_YSR_New_Internalizing_Problems_Total_Score, method = "log") # can't do log of 0, so doing log + 1
summary(ysr_log)
plot(ysr_log) 
# no need to log transform ysr - skewness and kurtosis are decent
```


# selecting variables
```{r}
ysr_siq_graph_select <-
  ysr_siq_graph %>%
  # converting race/ethinicity to factor and binarizing for analysis
    mutate(KSADS_Child_Race_by_P.T1 = factor(KSADS_Child_Race_by_P.T1),
         KSADS_Child_Race_by_P.T1_bin = ifelse(KSADS_Child_Race_by_P.T1 == "1", "1", "0"),
         # converting sex to factor
         sex_child = factor(sex_child)) %>%
  # removing orig race/eth variable, temporal follow-up variables, ysr subscales
  dplyr::select(-KSADS_Child_Race_by_P.T1, -siq_total_log, -siq_total.T3, -KSADS_Child_Race_by_P.T1_bin,  -Age_S1.T3, -Tanner_Average.T3, -KSADS_Child_Race_by_P.T1_bin,  -T1_KSADS_C_or_P_Thoughts, -T1_KSADS_C_or_P_bx, -T1_YSR_old_Withdrawn_Total_Score, -T1_YSR_old_Somatic_Complaints_Total_Score, -T1_YSR_old_AnxiousDepressed_Total_Score, -T3_YSR_New_AnxiousDepressed_Total_Score, -T3_YSR_New_WithdrawnDepressed_Total_Score, -T3_YSR_New_Somatic_Complaints_Total_Score) %>%
  # z-scoring follow-up ysr 
  mutate(T3_YSR_New_Internalizing_Problems_Total_Score_z = z_score(T3_YSR_New_Internalizing_Problems_Total_Score)) %>%
  # z-scoring the other numeric variables
  mutate_at(vars(-ELS_ID, -sex_child), z_score) %>%
  # selecting our dv (follow-up ysr, baseline ysr, and everything else)
  dplyr::select(ELS_ID, T3_YSR_New_Internalizing_Problems_Total_Score_z, T1_YSR_old_Internalizing_Problems_Total_Score, everything()) %>%
  # de-selecting the non-zscored follow-up ysr score
  dplyr::select(-T3_YSR_New_Internalizing_Problems_Total_Score, -ELS_ID)
```

```{r}
#as.matrix

ysr_predictors_scaled <- data.matrix(ysr_siq_graph_select[2:1261]) # columns 2 - 1261 are predictors
ysr_scaled <- ysr_siq_graph_select$T3_YSR_New_Internalizing_Problems_Total_Score_z # my response variable
```

## to get sense of coefficient path
```{r}
# if i want to UN-penalize variable (e.g., framewise displacement)
# supp_p.fac = rep(1, 1259)
# supp_p.fac[c(1259)] = 0

ysr_lasso <- glmnet(ysr_predictors_scaled, ysr_scaled, family = "gaussian", alpha = 1)

plot(ysr_lasso, xvar = "dev", label = TRUE)
```


### setting up folds
```{r}
set.seed(1234)
# We will use LOOCV to avoid randomness in folds

k <- ysr_siq_graph_select %>% nrow() # k is equal to num of obs
k
```

```{r}
# conducting cross validated glmnet on whole sample using LOOCV
ysr_cv_model_loocv <- cv.glmnet(x = ysr_predictors_scaled,
                            y = ysr_scaled,
                            family = "gaussian",
                            grouped = FALSE,
                            nfolds = k)

# computing RSquared value
# ysr_predictors_scaled is my x matrix
# ysr_scaled is my y
ysr_X <- model.matrix(T3_YSR_New_Internalizing_Problems_Total_Score_z ~ ., data = ysr_siq_graph_select)[,-1]
# predict
ysr_y_hat <- predict(ysr_cv_model_loocv,  newx = ysr_X,  s = "lambda.min")
# R-Squared
ysr_r_sq <- 1 - (sum((ysr_scaled - ysr_y_hat)^2) / sum((ysr_scaled - mean(ysr_scaled))^2))
ysr_r_sq # 0.1861916


## extracting coefficients
ysr_cv_model_loocv$lambda.min # 0.201221
options(max.print = 1265)
ysr_coef_loocv <- coef(ysr_cv_model_loocv, s = "lambda.min")
```


## reading in beta estimates for plotting
```{r}
ysr_loocv_lasso_coef <- read_excel("tbl3toPlot.xlsx", sheet = "ysr")
```

```{r}
ysr_lasso_results <- ysr_loocv_lasso_coef %>%
  ggplot(
    aes(
      x = reorder(Variable, ysrbetavalue),
      y = ysrbetavalue,
      fill = Lobe
    )
  ) + 
  geom_bar(stat = "identity") +
  coord_flip() +
  labs(x = "Variable", y = "YSR Beta Value") +
  ggtitle("Predictors of Internalizing Severity") +
  theme_blank() +
  scale_fill_brewer(palette="Set2")

ggsave("ysr_lasso_results.jpg", ysr_lasso_results, width = 7, height = 5)
```
